definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Choices D and E produce sentence fragments since Because makes the clause subordinate rather than independent .
sentences.chinese: 出現連詞引導的分句一定要有對應的主句。

sentences.english: What six year old child ever heard of a conjugation?
sentences.chinese: 六歲的兒童何時聽說過連詞？

sentences.english: Tones have grammatical functions in complex sentence without conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 語調在無連詞複合句中具有語法作用。

sentences.english: The two clauses are joined by a conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個分句由一個連詞連在一起。

sentences.english: Connect the words to give three pieces of good financial advice.
sentences.chinese: 連詞成句，給出三條好的理財建議。

sentences.english: Part II Combine the following words into one correct sentence. Choose the right sentence. (
sentences.chinese: 從下列連詞成句練習中，選擇正確的句子。

sentences.english: We conclude that grammaticalization and loan homonym are the main source of conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 我們考察發現虛化和同音假借是連詞的主要來源。

sentences.english: Do the exercises. Join two sentences with connectives .
sentences.chinese: 要求學生完成小黑板上的連詞練習。

sentences.english: After learning the alphabet, we started to teach him joining of words, and he started writing as well.
sentences.chinese: 學完字母表後，我們就開始教他連詞，以及書寫。

sentences.english: Why have I been taking gymnastics all these years until grade five?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼這些年來我一直堅持連詞體操呢？

sentences.english: Do the exercises. Join each two sentences with the conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 要求學生完成小黑板上的連詞練習。

sentences.english: Complete the sentence with right prepositions and conjunctions.
sentences.chinese: 用適當的介詞或連詞填空。

sentences.english: Notice the two sentences. Between them, we should add a conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 當心這兩句話，它們之間應加一個連詞。

sentences.english: There is a synonym group of adversative conjunctions in Morden Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 現代漢語的轉折連詞是一個組合。

definition: language component/morpheme/individual characters (making up an expression)
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
